website_summaries.verdict: Unusual yet dressy design is certain to turn heads.
pros: Water resistant to a limited depth
Stainless steel case with black dial and slim dot-and-stick markers
cons: Deployment clasp can be difficult to secure

customer_reviews.title: Cool and stylish like the Jetsons.
customer_reviews.text: Cool and stylish like the Jetsons. A little overpriced as it probably feels more like a "$300" watch, but I still love the look and the history behind the Ventura model.
customer_reviews.author: reatanak

customer_reviews.title: Impressive watch with incorrect instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: The watch came well packaged, and arrived on time. The watch is exquisite, and looked even better than the picture. The watch was a gift, and the recipient was thrilled and extremely happy with the watch. The only downside was that the instructions included with the watch were not the correct instructions for the watch received. Additionally, it was necessary to watch a YouTube video to figure out how to work the watch clasp. Having received the appropriate instruction manual would have been helpful. Also, we aren't sure whether the watch is self winding or battery operated. It will be necessary to try to find an online manual for the watch.
customer_reviews.author: TER

customer_reviews.title: Nice exclusive design if you don’t mind grabbing some extra $$.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it’s design, of course due to the movie MIB Disliked a little bit the strap attachment system, so called a folding clasp. Works a little awkward and gives the sensation that is gonna break soon (hope not).
customer_reviews.author: Bob Fred

customer_reviews.title: Elvis wore this watch in Blue Hawaii.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this watch since Elvis made it famous around 1961. The band is different, but adequate. The watch is not round, not square, not rectangle, not like any other watch. Thank you for making it affordable. It is a great conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: James May

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp watch.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived as promised within three days. I was very impressed with the quality of the watch. I really like the contrasting black leather band with the silver in the case and the dial. The think the size is perfect. It is large enough for the Art Deco shape to be noticeable without it being over the top. The warranties offered through the seller (WatchMaxx) and through Amazon allows one to buy with confidence. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: FlyingV

customer_reviews.title: The cleanest design Ventura
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted one since I saw Elvis wearing it in Blue Hawaii when I was little. Same one they used in all the MIB movies. A classic original American design, nothing else like it. Just need a 56 Caddy to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Timeless Classic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, it's so unusual and classic all at the same time! If it was good enough for Elvis in Blue Hawaii and the guys in Men and Black I figured it would be good enough for me too and I was right!
customer_reviews.author: Craig5150

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful unique timepiece
customer_reviews.text: The Ventura quartz is an absolutely stunning watch. Easily the favorite in my collection. I received it within two days of ordering (AmazonPrime member) and it was packaged with care. I definitely recommend this seller; i'll be ordering again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: my johnson

customer_reviews.title: Subtle and Clean
customer_reviews.text: Had this watch for about a week and love it. Nice craftsmanship and I love the style. I think I’ve found a brand I’ll stick to as long as I can. Take notice that it is a smaller styled watched, similar to what would today be a “women’s “ watch. It’s not meant to be ogled but admired subtly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVIN' THIS FINE TIMEPEICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting one of these watches for about 15+ years and I finally decided to treat myself. i'm so glad i did. This is probably the last watch I'll ever spend this much on and I have NO regrets. I cannot count the amount of compliments I've received so far. On second though.... I may go ahead and get the brown one too... then I'll stop. LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: William J. Wonka, Esq

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Ventura
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish and uniquely classy timepiece. Perfect accessory for an 'attention drawing' night out on the town.
customer_reviews.author: Paulie Mendonca

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. We couldn’t figure out the clasp on it, but the customer service was exceptional and got us sorted. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Valerie S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This is advertised as the male watch but I received the smaller female watch.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Abbatiello

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, slick watch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, slick watch! Totally love it. Only difficulty is with the strap - it's a pain to secure. I'll probably replace it with a flex band.
customer_reviews.author: P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Ventura OMG WTF
customer_reviews.text: I have 28 watches, (yes I may a problem:-) This is my favorite watch. Both in form, weight, style, comfort. There is no comparison excepting that this and the others tell time. Think for Ford VS Bugatti. All the details are right and the watch is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so unique...
customer_reviews.text: I must say that it delivered fast and looks better in person. The watch is going to take time getting used to as I never had clasps like it but I love how elegant and classy it is, I've gotten compliments almost every time I wear it...more than my very expensive Emporio Armani. I am very happy with my purchase, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore K.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE WATCH my husband has measured all other watches by, we are so pleased with our purchase, it came just as we were informed it would and might I add, my satisfaction has been of utmost importance to Amazon and their vendors, not only with this purchase, but everything I purchase, I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one of the Kings favorite watches
customer_reviews.text: great watch, Elvis wore this style of watch in the movie Blue Hawaii
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bovender

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Ventura men's watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very unique watch, with a vintage style that would look great with a suit or formal wear. The watch is very light weight (compared to my Omega Seamaster) and is very comfortable on the wrist. The only negative aspect of this watch is that the face and hands are not luminous, so it is very difficult to read in low light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It's a great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have this watch. I purchased another thinking it was a larger version of my present watch. I was wrong, It's a great watch!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This watch is BEAUTIFUL, I love it
customer_reviews.text: This watch is BEAUTIFUL, I love it. The way the watchband connects was easy to figure out, and it stays latched. The only "bad" thing I can say is that it was running when it arrived. I wonder how much battery life was used before I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Art Deco Watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Beautiful history and a beautiful watch. I love the unique Art Deco design. Light weight for its size and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: It's nice
customer_reviews.text: Going to order another one for my son. It's that mice
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his birthday present! This watch is unique. And handsome. Thanks for sending it so promptly!
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: I gave this watch to my husband for his birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch to my husband for his birthday. He says it "rocks!" Secure clasp on strap is a bit tricky but we figured it out. Very handsome watch on a man's wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Library Diva

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, smaller than expected but beautiful. Clasp while unique and in its self beautiful can be fiddly to close
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful time piece and quite unusual looking. I get compliments all the time on it.
customer_reviews.author: Val O Beasley

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and loves the fact about Elves had one just like it, Elves wore the watch in Memphis when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my husband for Christmas. He loves it and loves the fact about Elves had one just like it, Elves wore the watch in Memphis when preforming
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way Cool
customer_reviews.text: The coolness factor is only exceeded by the quality of the manufacturing. one two three four five six seven eight
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Even better in person
customer_reviews.text: Even better in person .......Grad gift for my son. He was ecstatic; he has been wanting this since he first saw it on Men in Black. A beautiful timeless piece to add to his collection. Thank you Amazon for your help in making it possible and for shipping so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Makes you want to get dressed up
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this as a birthday/fathers day gift and I couldn't be happier with this watch. Fit and finish are very good ,the leather band is well made though alittle stiff,but I'm sure it will soften with use.It took a couple of tries to get the deployment band adjusted but once you figure it out it's pretty simple. I've only worn this watch out twice but and have had numerous comments/ compliments on it. I told my wife I like it so much that it makes me want to get dressed up and go out more often.Win/Win for both of us. I will update on accuracy and reliability later. A fine watch and a great piece of americana.
customer_reviews.author: steveh

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased as punch that I finally got hat I really ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased as punch that I finally got hat I really wanted in life. It's a beautiful thing! And looks like no other.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Green

customer_reviews.title: I really like the watch but it is about $70 less in ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the watch but it is about $70 less in two weeks from when I got it : (
customer_reviews.author: Janette Myers

customer_reviews.title: A work of art
customer_reviews.text: I just got this watch after wanting one for years. It's a thing of beauty. I hope it proves to be as durable as it is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: B. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: A huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: IT came with a defective clasp. Can you believe a watch of this price comes with a band that does not work. I had to find a jeweler to diagnosis the problem and now I have to hassle with returning it. What a huge disappointment. I wanted this watch for so long and it just keeps popping off my writs. It is a beautiful watch but God forbid you have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: mr. ipod

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful looking watch but I thought it would be a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful looking watch but I thought it would be a little bigger not too happy with it but I'll keep it anyway should of order the xxl Elvis edition wish I could exchange it :(
customer_reviews.author: eric brandon

customer_reviews.title: Plan ahead
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch for an anniversary gift and paid for expedited shipping. Because of the holiday and processing time, it actually didn't arrive until after our wedding anniversary. It is a nice watch and my husband likes it, after he figured out how to put the band on (take your time it is a bit tricky the first time).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Men in Black Watch
customer_reviews.text: The Hamilton Mens H24411732 is a very attractive watch, however the band is too small and it is uncomfortable as the metal portion under your wrist digs in to you. Not real happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: coolreed

customer_reviews.title: it was so small, its for womens, im ...
customer_reviews.text: it was so small , its for womens , im so dispoinnt .. !
customer_reviews.author: saif alotaibi

product_meta.title: Hamilton Mens H24411732 Ventura Stainless Steel Watch with Black Leather Band
product_meta.description:
Asymmetric stainless steel case with a black leather bracelet. Fixed polished stainless steel bezel. Black dial with silver-tone hands and dot indices hour markers. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Solid case back. Case diameter: 31 mm. Case thickness: 11 mm. Deployment clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: hours, minutes. Additional Information: end of battery life indicator. Hamilton Men's H24411732 Ventura Black Dial Watch.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.72 x 4.72 x 4.72 inches; 15.84 Ounces
 * Item model number :H24411732
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Unknown batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :June 1, 2004
 * Manufacturer :Hamilton
 * ASIN :B003XGN3TI

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

    *  #35361 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars76 ratings Asymmetric stainless steel case with a black leather bracelet. Fixed polished stainless steel bezel. Black dial with silver-tone hands and dot indices hour markers. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Solid case back. Case diameter: 31 mm. Case thickness: 11 mm. Deployment clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: hours, minutes. Additional Information: end of battery life indicator. Hamilton Men's H24411732 Ventura Black Dial Watch.
feature_bullets: Dramatic watch featuring asymmetric stainless steel case with black dial and slim dot-and-stick markers
31-mm stainless steel case with anti-reflective sapphire dial window
Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling
